text: hi there I'm Sarah and I'm going to tell
you about something I really miss about
living in Canada so in Canada for dinner
we often have a backyard barbecue so
it's kind of like the barbecue that you
have in a restaurant but we do it in our
backyard on the porch so at dinnertime
we have our friends or our family come
over and we barbecue but the weather's
really nice it's a little bit cool but
it's been warm all day and while we're
waiting for the meat to cook we drink
beer or wine so the meat will be maybe
hamburger maybe hotdogs on the weekend
maybe steak or ribs and for side dishes
we'll have like something that's very
fresh from the summer like corn on the
cob or green beans or potato salad or
cole slaw
these are all very summery foods and
we'll sit around and we'll talk and
we'll drink and then it will get dark
and we'll go inside and I really miss
that about Canada thanks for watching
